title: Lunar revel skins coming soon?
body: So, I noticed that the skins are showing up for the champions but not in the store. Does this mean that the new lunar revel skins are coming soon?

replies.body:
Waiting for that Katarina skin :)

Not sure about Jinx tho.
Expect them some time tomorrow afternoon all 3 will probably be released at the same time with the cards showing on the news back to back
Yup! (They're in the champion page at the start of every patch, they're just not all unlocked.)

btw, Katey. Do you happen to the link to the list of legacy skin?? =3 I thought I had it bookmarked the last time you posted it, but I guess not. I'm not sure which post you last showed it in either. Cause I was wondering if any of this year's Lunar skins are legacy or not. I only remember that Jinx is permanent.

You mean [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins)?

Firecracker Jinx isn't legacy, and neither are WK Katarina/Nidalee. :]

Yes. Thank you. =3

Oh, hmmm, that list. I almost forgot about the Samsung skins. I wonder when those will be. I forget when the others were released.
I want that Jinx skin sooooo bad. Why do you have to wait so long to release it? Why wont you take my money!?!

I sure hope so.  As an FYI to Riot the skins are awesome, but you previewed them so early it was kind of a let down waiting like two (or was it three?) weeks for them to come out.  I even got jinx for her new skin, and then was like.. ok where is it.. c'mon now... *checks watch.* :P

At this point the excitement has kind of died down.  The skins look awesome though.  Planning on getting one.

Hoping the wait on DJ Sona won't be super long!
it's months, gotta suck it up and get good at Sona in the meantime :)
